testCases.name: first_row_mixed
testCases.description: First 4 cells of row 0: uncovered, gray, white, uncovered
testCases.note: Byte 0: bits 0-1=00 (uncovered), bits 2-3=01 (gray), bits 4-5=10 (white), bits 6-7=00 (uncovered) = 0b01101000 = 0x68, but full grid would be 128x128

note: Full grid packing test requires 128x128 = 16384 cells = 4096 bytes. This is a minimal test case.
